game_description: Enter a fantasy world and become a powerful wizard. Different, dynamic and frenetic game in which you'll have to take your wands and defend the ancient magic temples of enemies attacks. Explode orbs of energy, link orbs according to the color of their energy, send objects to another dimension, shoot magical projectiles, stop the time, invoke shields ... all this and much more in this original and different game. Three temples are waiting for you to defend them. In each one you will find different challenges. You can play in adventure mode or in resistance mode. In adventure mode you will have to face different tests in each level. In resistance mode ... ahem ... survive what you can, it will not be much. What are you waiting for to become the magic guardian?
